description: The form which approvals should be created in (if not defined on form or space)
name: Approval Form Slug

description: Options are: Team Name, Individual Name or manager. If this is set, all forms in this kapp will get approvals sent to the value set here unless specified in a form.
name: Approver

description: The name of the package that this Kapp should use for display
name: Bundle Package

description: Description of what users do within this Kapp
name: Description

description: The Discussion Id related to this kapp
name: Discussion Id

description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Created, Deleted, Updated) Workflow types are (Standard, True, False, or a custom process name) Example (Created - False | Deleted - True | Updated - My Custom Process)
name: Form Workflow

description: Defines whether the Kapp is configured. Value is automatically managed by the Setup Wizard. DO NOT MODIFY.
name: Kapp Configuration Status

description: Name of the Notification Template to use when submissions in this Kapp Completed
name: Notification Template Name - Complete

description: Name of the Notification Template to use when submissions in this Kapp are Submitted
name: Notification Template Name - Create

description: Team that owns and manages services in this kapp (overridden by form attributes)
name: Owning Team

description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled for forms in this Kapp - This attribute is overridden if set at the form level
name: Service Days Due

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Active
name: Statuses - Active

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Cancelled
name: Statuses - Cancelled

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Inactive
name: Statuses - Inactive

description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Submitted, Created, Updated, Deleted) Workflow types are (Standard, True, False, or a custom process name) This attribute can be overridden by a form's attribute Example (Submitted - False | Submitted - True | Submitted - My Custom Process)
name: Submission Workflow

description: Team to assign tasks to if not defined in a form or space
name: Task Assignee Team

description: The form to use when creating a task item. (If set here, all forms in this kapp, unless specified at the form level will have tasks created in the form set here)
name: Task Form Slug
